apptext.appdescription: Welcome to the Maytag Qualifier tool!

text.question: Welcome to My Maytag, what can we help you find?
Which product would you like to explore first?
What product are you shopping for today?

Cooking - Wall Ovens - Size.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Size?
Cooking - Wall Ovens - Size.explanation: Our wall ovens come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: We’ve got the perfect wall oven for your family. Just tell us how much space you have to fill.
When shopping for an oven, what’s most important to you?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Preference?
text.explanation: By understanding your cooking priorities, we can better understand what features you need that will suit your lifestyle.

Cooking - Wall Ovens - Cooking Style.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
Cooking - Wall Ovens - Cooking Style.explanation: Our ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your needs.

text.question: How would your family describe you?

answers.text_more: birthday cakes, Thanksgiving pies and gingerbread men, I’m usually covered in flour.
Holiday roasts, Sunday night casserole and taco Tuesdays I love trying new recipes.
I shine at school bake sales and can have mastered family-friendly meatloaf.
My family’s stack of take-out menus is impressive.

Cooking - Wall Ovens - Usage.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Usage?
Cooking - Wall Ovens - Usage.explanation: Our ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your cooking needs.

text.question: How do you use your oven?

answers.text: To mostly reheat leftovers and frozen meals
To help me host parties and cook multi-course meals

Cooking - Wall Ovens - Lifestyle.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About My Kitchen?
Cooking - Wall Ovens - Lifestyle.explanation: How you use your kitchen will help us determine what kind of features you need to keep up with your life.

text.question: I consider my kitchen…

answers.text: The busy control room of my home where we get the kids ready for school, lunches packed, soccer and so much more.
The place where we create new family favourite meals.
Our entertaining hub – the place where birthdays, holidays and BBQs come together.

Cooking - Wall Ovens - Energy.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
Cooking - Wall Ovens - Energy.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect wall oven to fit your needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your household?

Cooking - Ranges - Preference.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Preference?
Cooking - Ranges - Preference.explanation: By understanding your cooking priorities, we can better understand what features you need to suit your lifestyle.

text.question: When shopping for a range, what’s most important to you?

Cooking - Ranges - Energy.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
Cooking - Ranges - Energy.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect one to fit your needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your household?

Cooking - Ranges - Capacity.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
Cooking - Ranges - Capacity.explanation: If you cook large meals often, then we recommend an oven with a larger capacity.

text.question: How often do you need extra space in your oven?

Cooking - Ranges - Cooking Style.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
Cooking - Ranges - Cooking Style.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

text.question: Why do you cook?

answers.text: From Sunday roasts to pasta night, my family depends on me to make dinner.
Because I’m always trying new dishes for my family, I need a range that can handle variety.
From birthday parties to family holidays, I need a range that can handle cakes and feasts for a crowd.
Cook? We’re more of a take-out family with an impressive collection of frozen foods.

Cooking - Ranges - Convection.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
Cooking - Ranges - Convection.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

text.question: How would your family describe you?

answers.text_more: birthday cakes, Thanksgiving pies and gingerbread men, I’m usually covered in flour.
Holiday roasts, Sunday night casserole and taco Tuesdays I love trying new recipes.
I shine at school bake sales and can have mastered family-friendly meatloaf.
My family’s stack of take-out menus is impressive.

Cooking - Ranges - Usage.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Usage?
Cooking - Ranges - Usage.explanation: Our ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your cooking needs.

text.question: How do you use your oven?

answers.text: Will help me host parties and cook multi-course meals
Will help me make the perfect sauce
Perfectly cooks a high temperature stir-fry

Cooking - Ranges - Lifestyle.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About My Kitchen?
Cooking - Ranges - Lifestyle.explanation: How you use your kitchen will help us determine what kind of features you need to keep up with your life.

text.question: I consider my kitchen…

answers.text: The busy control room of my home where we get the kids ready for school, lunches packed, soccer and so much more.
The place where we create new family favourite meals.
Our entertaining hub – the place where birthdays, holidays and BBQs come together.

Cooking - Ranges - Gas.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Gas?
Cooking - Ranges - Gas.explanation: Some kitchens are equipped for gas and others are not. We need to know this information to recommend the perfect range.

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas?

answers.text: Yes – we’re cooking with fire now
No – we just plug-in and go

Laundry - Energy.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
Laundry - Energy.explanation: All of our machines are different, if we can understand your energy use we can find a machine that meets your specific lifestyle needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your household?

Laundry - Capacity 1.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my family size?
Laundry - Capacity 1.explanation: Like your family, all of our machines are unique. If we understand a little more about your family we can recommend a machine that suits the specific needs of your home.

text.question: How many people are in your household?

Laundry - Capacity 2.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
Laundry - Capacity 2.explanation: Large capacity laundry machines can help you manage your biggest items, but only if you need them to. By understanding what you wash we can recommend the machine that suits your family best.

text.question: What's the biggest thing that you'll need to wash?

answers.text: A duvet fit for a king.
The kids’ laundry. So much kids’ laundry.

Laundry - Noise.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about sound?
Laundry - Noise.explanation: Some of our laundry pairs are specifically designed to limit noise. By understanding your needs we can find the perfect machines for your home.

text.question: Are you concerned about the noise level of your laundry machines?

answers.text: Very much so, my laundry is located near a bedroom
A little bit, but noise doesn’t bother me for the most part
Not at all, my laundry is down in the basement

Laundry - Orientation.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about space constraints?
Laundry - Orientation.explanation: We understand that every laundry space is different. By understanding yours, we are able to find the perfect pairing for your home.

text.question: Do you have any space constraints for your laundry room?

answers.text: The ceiling is a little low, but there’s plenty of space on the floor
Low ceiling and very little floor space
High ceiling and very little floor space

Laundry - Speed.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about dry time?
Laundry - Speed.explanation: Some of our laundry machines are specifically designed to get you out the door in record time. By understanding your needs we can find the machine that suits your lifestyle best.

text.question: Do you often need items washed and dried in under an hour?

answers.text: Yes, we are always on the go
Only when there is an unexpected spill

Laundry - Fabrics.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fabrics?
Laundry - Fabrics.explanation: Everyone does their laundry differently. By understanding how you separate your fabrics, we will be better able to suggest cycle options that fit your specific lifestyle needs.

text.question: What kind of fabrics do you wash together?

Laundry - Sensor.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about time?
Laundry - Sensor.explanation: We would like to save you time by offering you cycles that will minimize your need to continually check your laundry progress.

text.question: What do you find yourself doing to your dryer?

Laundry - Wrinkles.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about ironing?
Laundry - Wrinkles.explanation: Some of our machines are designed to minimize wrinkles. By helping us determine your needs, we are better able to provide for them.

text.question: How close are you and your iron?

scale: Very, my iron and I are the best of friends

Laundry - Fuel Type.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fuel?
Laundry - Fuel Type.explanation: Some laundry rooms are fitted for gas dryers. Selecting your preference will help us filter the search results and provide the option best suited for your home.

text.question: Would you prefer a gas or electric dryer?

Laundry - Dry Cleaning.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my dry-cleaning?
Laundry - Dry Cleaning.explanation: Some of our machines are designed to help refresh clothes. By helping us determine your needs, we are better able to provide for them.

text.question: How often do you rely on a dry-cleaner?

Fridges - Energy.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
Fridges - Energy.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect one to fit your needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your household?

Fridges - Size.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Size?
Fridges - Size.explanation: Our fridges come in many sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: We’ve got the perfect fridge for your family. Just tell us how much space you have to fill.

Fridges - Capacity.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
Fridges - Capacity.explanation: We want to get a better idea of how you use your fridge and what you put in it so we can find you the one that fits your lifestyle.

text.question: On a regular basis, I depend on my fridge to feed...

scale:
Myself
to keep me fueled all week

Me and my better half
we like to take care of each other

A family of four
from pasta night to meatloaf Sundays, we’re a hungry bunch

My large family
The cooking never ends, at least we have leftovers for packed lunches

My guests when entertaining
I might as well open a birthday party catering service

Fridges - Organization.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Organization?
Fridges - Organization.explanation: Our fridges are carefully designed from the inside out. By better learning how you use your fridge, it will help us choose the right fridge for your lifestyle.

text.question: I need a fridge for my family that can…

answers.text: Keep the drinks cold - from milk to fruit juice, pop to iced tea and everything in between
Be our personal grocery store - all ten aisles in one place
Hold our ready-to-eat prepared meals - we’re always on the go
Store lots of food for birthdays, team celebrations and BBQs

Fridges - Water.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Water?
Fridges - Water.explanation: Some of our fridge models provide water dispensing features. By understanding how you consume water, we can suggest a fridge that will best suit your needs.

text.question: You wake up thirsty in the middle of the night, so you grab...

answers.text: A nice, cold bottle of water
A drink from our water cooler
A glass of milk or juice

Fridges - Ice.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Ice?
Fridges - Ice.explanation: Some of our fridge models provide ice dispensing features. By understanding how you consume ice, we can better match a fridge to your lifestyle.

text.question: I like to add ice to...

Fridges - Orientation.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Water?
Fridges - Orientation.explanation: Some of our fridge models provide water dispensing features. By understanding how you consume water, we can suggest a fridge that will best suit your needs.

text.question: For the most part, your family’s fridge is...

Fridges - Style.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Style?
Fridges - Style.explanation: Since some fridges are built deeper than typical counter depth, we need to know how important having a fridge that's in-line with your counters is to your purchasing decision.

text.question: I choose form over function...

scale:
Always
Home aesthetics are very important to me

Sometimes
I like to balance form and function

Fridges - Features.explanation_title: Why Are You Ask Me About Groceries?
Fridges - Features.explanation: Our fridges are designed with unique features. By understanding how you shop, we learn more about how you use your fridge and can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

text.question: How do you shop for your groceries?

answers.text: I’m on a first-name basis at the farmers’ market.
I visit the grocery store but stick to the perimeter to get the basics.
I go aisle-to-aisle at the grocery store and always fill my cart.
The frozen food aisle is my second home.

Dishwashers - Cleaning Power.explanation_title: Why are you asking me what I wash?
Dishwashers - Cleaning Power.explanation: We want to ensure all of your dishes sparkle, understanding what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to recommend options that best address your washing needs.

text.question: What would we find inside your dishwasher right now?

answers.text: Every single utensil known to humankind

Dishwashers - Capacity.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
Dishwashers - Capacity.explanation: When it comes to washing dishes there is no job too big or too small. Understanding what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to find the perfect fit for your family.

text.question: My family generates this many dishes every week:

Dishwashers - Cycles.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cycles?
Dishwashers - Cycles.explanation: Think of custom cycles like a tailored fit for your dishes. This question will help us to determine which additional features will be of use to you.

Dishwashers - Noise.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about start time?
Dishwashers - Noise.explanation: Much like people, dishwashers have different sound profiles. By understanding your start time we can determine which machine is best for your family.

text.question: When do you usually hit the start button?

answers.text: After I get my kids organized and into bed
Every morning before we all scatter out of the house

Dishwashers - Flexibility.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
Dishwashers - Flexibility.explanation: After assessing your technique we can suggest ways to optimize organization for your home.

text.question: Before running your dishwasher, it looks like this:

Dishwashers - Style.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
Dishwashers - Style.explanation: After assessing your technique we can suggest ways to optimize organization for your home.

text.question: Select your style...

Dishwashers - Energy.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
Dishwashers - Energy.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the  families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect dishwasher to fit your needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your household?
